key_points: Tom Brady reflected on the impact of the Patriots' Super Bowl 42 loss to the Giants on his career and motivation.
Brady questioned if his desire to compete would have been different if the Patriots had achieved a perfect season in 2008.
The episode of "Man in the Arena" featured Brady pondering the effects of the loss on his passion for the game.
The Patriots completed the 2007 regular season with a 16-0 record before losing to the Giants in the Super Bowl.
Brady described feeling heartbroken and sleepless following the unexpected defeat.
He emphasized learning from experiences, regardless of their outcome, as a life lesson.
Brady vowed to himself to celebrate wholeheartedly if he ever won another Super Bowl.
Post-2007, Brady achieved additional Super Bowl victories, including a memorable win against the Seahawks in 2015.
Brady has won a total of seven Super Bowl rings, with three more victories following the discussed loss.
Now at age 44 and playing for the Buccaneers, Brady secured his most recent Super Bowl championship earlier this year.
